title: Banned
body: Why Am i Still Banned, i was supoosed to be un banned on may 8th 2017 lol

replies.body: Your suspension escalated to permanent after playing through another game using extreme violence, racism, and griefing in chat.  If you have any questions or concerns, our PB team is available through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Well, just judging by your username... I don't think people will actually care enough to go out of their way to help you... and I'd more likely assume that your account got permanently banned. If you honestly don't think you were perm banned, you can submit a ticket to request the information regarding your ban.
